title: Our Next Guest, Micah Solusod!
content:
JAFAX is thrilled to announce before the holidays that Micah Solusod will be attending JAFAX 2020!

He is best known for his breakout role as Soul in "Soul Eater". Since then, he has gone on to voice many other characters such as Yuichiro in "Seraph of the End", Touma in "A Certain Magical Index", Yurio in "Yuri!!! On ICE", and many more!

Take a look at his bio to find out more!
